level.heading: NOTICE OF SPECIAL PILOT PROCUREMENTS (ยง 27-1308)

level.text: 1308.1 Unless otherwise determined by the Director, a notice of intent to use the special pilot procurement method shall be published on the OCP Internet for at least ten (10) days prior to discussions. The notice shall include:
A copy of the proposed determination and findings required under ยง 408(c) of the Act;
A clear description of the goods or services to be procured;
The name of the proposed contractor, if the agency has identified a proposed contractor;
How vendors may express their interest in providing the required goods or services;
Special pilot awards, regardless of dollar value, shall be published in accordance with the provisions in ยง 1305 of this chapter.
